scripts.version: npm run version:changelog && npm run version:sync && git add -A
scripts.release: git switch release && git merge main --ff-only && git push --follow-tags && git switch main
scripts.release:patch: git switch main && git pull && npm version patch && git push && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: git switch main && git pull && npm version minor && git push && npm run release
scripts.release:major: git switch main && git pull && npm version major && git push && npm run release
